name: VR Church Orthodox
description:
The stage of the Orthodox Temple immerses you in an atmosphere of peace of mind and peace. Here you can be alone with your thoughts, immerse yourself in reflections on the Highest, turn to God with prayer. In the scene, an opportunity is given to light a candle for the peace of the soul or for health. You can activate voice prayers and voiced stories of saints. And you can also read the prayers on the lectern yourself.

ATTENTION!

Dedicated to play SITTING!

Tested on Oculus Rift S
